name: Alley Rally
overview: Alley Rally is a top-down racing game for one or two players. Each player must drive as many laps as fast as he can. For each quarter lap driven points are scored. Drone cars drive around the track which should not be collided with or all velocity is lost. The player has a gear shift which can be set into low or high. When the car comes to a standstill or the pedal is let loose the player must shift back to low gear to continue driving.
